item.title: Not so obvious tech that I believe will become mainstream
item.description: By the time of writing of this article everyone knows, the “technologies of the future” as listed from various mainstream media. And I agree with most of them. It is worth discussing a few not so obvious though. I expect my “predictions” to be fulfilled by 2030. Please note that these are my personal views. The views are built according to my understanding of how technology (and society) evolves. I am by no means a psychic, so reality might prove me wrong.
